title: SEPTODONT - Manager - QA / RA M / F
jobDescription:
Work Location: Taloja MIDC, Navi-Mumbai, Maharashtra.
The Quality Assurance/Regulatory Affairs Manager is responsible for ensuring that the company s products comply with all regulatory standards and that quality systems are maintained and improved. This role involves overseeing quality assurance processes, managing regulatory submissions, and ensuring compliance with applicable regulations and standards. The QA/RA Manager works closely with cross-functional teams, including product development, manufacturing, and marketing, to support the lifecycle of the companys products from development through commercialization.
Responsibilities
  • Oversee Quality Management System (QMS), policies and standards to support proper and smooth execution of Quality related activities in meeting the specified standards and requirements, consistent with GMP.
  • Ensure risk management principles are implementing through the organization in all activities.
  • Establish company quality plan including quality policy (based on corporate QA policies and procedures) and continually improve it.
    Promote quality achievement and performance improvement throughout the organization and report performance of the QMS to upper management.
  • Ensure deviations/non-conforming products management and implement preventive measures and corrective actions. Evaluate and ensure CAPA effectiveness.
  • Ensure Quality Management System complies as per Drugs and Cosmetics Act, Medical Device Rule 2017, MDD Medical Device Regulations and is effectively established, maintained and efficient
  • Ensure suppliers and customers qualification, maintain their approved status according to applicable procedures.
    Manage change controls and authorize their implementation after assessment and approval from authorities/notified body/legal manufacturer.
  • Oversee internal audits as well as vendor/supplier/customer audits as per GMP ISO 13485 ISO22716 MDR requirements.
    Prepare and implement the project inspection strategy to cover all project phases from the QA/RA perspective.
  • Facilitate and manage inspection or audit from customer, notified body and regulatory authorities and their follow up actions.
    Continuously review quality control processes, procedures, and capabilities in order to sustain the most cost-effective and efficient methods for meeting quality requirements and making recommendations for improvement as appropriate.
  • Manage and control all quality control activities in accordance with identified Quality Assurance standards, company procedures, client specifications and contract requirements.
  • Assist in the production of generic and project-specific method statements and risk assessments.
    Handle all product complaints and taking proper corrective measure under root cause analysis.
  • Provide training to all employees related to ISO, MDR, GMP and Medical device regulations as per EU.
    Ensure all regulatory compliances related to products and processes are met.
  • Ensure regulatory watch and quality standard watch applicable to QMS and QC test.
  • Ensure process validation, cleaning validation, equipment and utilities qualification and monitoring, revalidation program and calibration.
  • Ensure batch record review and approve batch disposition.
  • Handle in Process QA activities of manufacturing and packaging areas.
  • Conduct and document management review, follow and communicate KPIs as defined.
  • Approve and coordinate any returned products and disposal of returned products.
  • To follow and adhere the requirement as mention in the following standard ISO 13485, ISO 22716, cGMP, MDR-2017
Qualifications
Minimum bachelor s degree in science or related field (BioMedical, Biochemistry, Pharmaceutical Science, Biotechnology etc.), or experience demonstrating equivalent required knowledge and competencies.
Certification in a regulatory or quality discipline would be an asset (IGMPI)
5+ years in a quality assurance management role in Medical Device and leadership equivalent role;

Effective communication and report writing skills;
Good negotiating skills with customer-oriented attitude;
Excellent analytical abilities to grasp the key points from complicated details;

Good leadership qualities to lead projects to successful completion;
Basic knowledge of applicable software to infer statistical data;
Familiarity with the tools, concepts and methodologies of quality management;

Knowledge of and experience with all regulatory requirements concerning class I, II and III devices including

Knowledge of QSR/QMS to support ISO-13485, ISO22716, GMP, Medical Device Regulation (2017/745), compliance/processes, CE Marks and audits;
Experience with lab work;
Familiarity with manufacturing techniques, project management and formal continuous process improvement techniques (Lean Management).
Contract type
Permanent
Candidate criteria Minimum level of education required
3- Bachelor
Minimum level of experience required

title: Senior iOS Engineer

ambitionBoxData.Title: Heady Technologies Consultancy Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
We are looking for a Senior iOS Engineer who enjoys solving difficult problems. Our ideal candidate is someone who is not afraid of diving deep into computer science concepts to produce the best solution and very much excited to play around with the latest technologies (think hackathons, but at work). We want someone who genuinely looks forward to Apple Developer Conferences, and uses the latest technologies and features for fun because they want to as soon as they are announced. Simply put, candidates should be excited about building iPhone and iPad apps, iWatch apps, and even TvOS apps.


Technical Qualifications:

  • Familiarity with architectural patterns like MVC, MVVM, and VIPER.
  • Good grasp of UIKit, CoreData, and NotificationCenter.
  • Basic understanding of CoreFoundation, CoreLocation, CoreAnimation, and CoreGraphics.
  • Knowledge of common design patterns.
  • Understanding and application of S.O.L.I.D principles.
  • Experience with unit testing.
  • Proficiency in Swift programming, including the Swift Standard Library.
  • Attention to detail for accurate design implementation.
  • Ability to collaborate effectively with Product Managers, development teams, and QA teams.
  • Strong debugging and troubleshooting skills.
  • Familiarity with source control systems like Git and dependency management.
  • Understanding of Functional Reactive Programming is a must
  • Bonus: Knowledge of SwiftUI

Requirements:

  • 5+ years experience working with Objective C and Swift
  • Bachelors degree or higher in Computer Science (or related field)
  • Ability to build code with an international team
  • Efficient communicator
  • Contribution to open source projects is a plus

title: Automation and Commissioning Engineer
tagsAndSkills: wincc,Industrial Automation,Siemens PLC,PLC Programming,SCADA,Allen Bradley Plc,rockwell software,OMRON

ambitionBoxData.Title: DPM Instruments Private Limited  Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
Job description
We are actively seeking a dynamic and skilled Commissioning Automation Engineer to enhance our team's capabilities. In this role, you will primarily focus on commissioning PLC control panels,
troubleshooting, debugging PLC programs, and resolving electrical issues. You will work closely with cross-functional teams and clients in industries such as Pharma, Life Science, and Chemical
sectors.



Responsibilities:
Commissioning of PLC and control panels, ensuring a smooth and efficient process.
Troubleshoot and debug PLC programs, resolving issues promptly.
Identify and address electrical problems during commissioning activities.
Utilize your programming skills to develop and modify PLC programs for different brands,
including Siemens, Schneider, IndoSoft, and Rockwell Software.
Collaborate with the development team to contribute insights into Control Panel Design and
Electrical Architectures.
Ensure that control panels meet design specifications and industry standards.
Support the development of SCADA systems, incorporating SQL for efficient data
management.
Work on integrating PLCs and SCADA systems for seamless functionality.
Coordinate with vendors to procure necessary components and ensure the availability of
resources for successful project execution.
Communicate progress, challenges, and solutions effectively, both verbally and in writing.
Provide clear updates on commissioning activities to internal teams and clients.
Work closely with cross-functional teams, providing technical support and contributing to the
achievement of project goals.
Foster a collaborative environment to enhance teamwork and project efficiency.
Demonstrate a willingness to learn and adapt to new technologies, tools, and industry trends.
Stay informed about advancements in Industrial Automation to enhance personal and team
capabilities.
Be flexible and ready to travel within India and abroad for project implementation,
commissioning activities, and client meetings.
Ensure timely and organized planning for travel-related logistics.


Requirements:
Bachelor's degree or Diploma in Engineering or related field.
Solid understanding of Industrial Automation principles and practices.
Familiarity with PLC programming and SCADA systems.
Experience with Control Panel Design and Electrical Architectures is a plus.
Strong communication skills and ability to work in a team-oriented environment.
Willingness to learn and adapt to new technologies and tools.
Looking for someone who is willing to travel to below Job locations.




Experience holders will be directly joining as Automation & Commissioning Engineer
Probation period of 3 months is applicable for both.

Job Location :
Mahape MIDC, Navi Mumbai, Maharashtra.
And
Additional Ambernath MIDC East, Thane, Maharashtra


Timing :
9:30 AM to 6 PM
Monday to Saturday

title: TGT English & SST Teacher - PCMC
jobDescription:
Overview


The quality of school education available to students from low-income communities across India is abysmal. Their chances of getting admitted to a college or building a career are much lower than their high-income peers, condemning them to a life without voice or choice. iTeach was born to declare war on this status quo and create a level playing field for ALL children. We do this in Pune and Navi Mumbai by co-creating contextual school models with Municipal Corporations.

We run 10 free and high-impact secondary schools and a college-to-career program for the most disadvantaged students. In 2024, with a staff of 250 members across 10 schools, we will serve 3000 students and 2000 alumni - giving students a fighting chance at college, career, and citizenship. We aim to grow to 30 schools and 10,000 students over the next five years. 

Take a peek into our world by clicking the link here: https://www.iteachschools.org/

Key Responsibilities:

A teacher at iTeach Schools wears multiple hats to ensure an excellent education for their students. The three different parts of the role are:


l - Teaching your subject (60% time)

  • Use existing resources and design innovative Annual Plans, Unit Plans, and Lesson Plans
  • Teach one or two subjects of your expertise to your class (about 30 students in each class)
  • Conduct regular tests and assessments to monitor learning and give feedback to students
  • Build a positive and strong school culture with a focus on learning and joy
  • Collaborate with the parents of the students through regular meetings to create a positive learning environment

ll - Mentoring students (20% time)

  • Mentor nearly 15-20 students throughout the year
  • Develop ways to ensure that these students have strong study habits, high attendance, and the drive to excel-share these plans with all teachers across the ecosystem
  • Mentor students to identify a best-fit career after Grade X

lll - Leading projects in school (20% time)

  • Work with the School Principal and Vice Principal to lead multiple projects essential to student learning (based on your talents), such as Annual Day, Sports Day, Hobby Clubs, etc.
  • Use these opportunities to strengthen your leadership skills and mentor new teachers

Education & Experience:

  • Required: Bachelors Degree with strong academic and holistic performance
  • Preferred: B Ed Degree
  • Preferred: Teaching experience in a secondary grade for 1-2 years

Compensation and Benefits: We take pride in offering competitive compensation and benefits commensurate with the candidate's education and work experience. The salary range for this position ranges from 3.3 - 4.2 LPA CTC, and we are dedicated to providing top-notch industry benefits. These benefits include PF, gratuity, medical insurance (up to 3 lakh PA), paid leaves, annual increments, and promotion opportunities.
